title: Modus Launches New Digital Co-Pilot, Real Time Process Management System Enabling Users to View and Control eDiscovery Data in Real-Time
text:
Digital Co-Pilot is engineered to empower clients with variable, hands-on control, enabling them to increase productivity, reduce costs, improve accuracy, forecast more accurately and optimize entire project results.
Washington, DC
Modus eDiscovery, an evolving eDiscovery company that provides eDiscovery and managed services to law firms and corporations, announced today the launch of its new proprietary Modus Digital Co-Pilot Real-Time Process Management System to add to the company’s suite of advanced technology products and solutions.
Brian Kawasaki, Modus COO, states, “ Digital Co-Pilot is a powerful, interactive command module that enables clients to monitor, control and analyze critical eDiscovery data for individual and collective matters throughout the entire EDRM lifecycle. Complementing its real-time visualization, tracking and reporting features, Digital Co-Pilot enables clients to interact with live data via customized templates and profiles to optimize project workflow in tandem with Modus.”
Version 1 of a 3-part solution release provides clients with a “first class window seat” enabling them to view, track and interact with live data via an intuitive interface ported directly from kCura’s Relativity and other internal Modus technology platforms. In addition to interacting with live data, users can create multiple reports to help them manage their legal organizations in real-time format.
Kawasaki adds, “ Digital Co-Pilot is engineered to empower clients with variable, hands-on control, enabling them to increase productivity, reduce costs, improve accuracy, forecast more accurately and optimize entire project results. We are very excited to be at the forefront of technology advancements in the industry. We look forward to releasing Digital Co-Pilot Version 2 and 3 over the next 6-9 months with multiple, one-of-a-kind, proprietary features.”
Digital Co-Pilot version 2 is scheduled for January 2016, providing users with more control over their data via a customizable interface. Users will be able to proactively upload and interact with their data, providing deeper insight and control across all phases of their projects.
To learn more about Modus Digital Co-Pilot or schedule a demo on line or in person, please visit the Solutions section of the Discover Modus website, or join us on Oct 21st at 1 PM EDT for a live webinar demoing the new advanced system.
ABOUT MODUS
Modus is an evolving DC-based eDiscovery company that helps organizations assess, strategize and leverage critical business intelligence obtained from people, processes, finances and data to optimize legal and enterprise-wide business results. Since its inception in 2008, the company has experienced exponential gains in market share, thought-leadership and financial success by conducting extensive market research and reengineering the company’s services, solutions and brand to align congruently with specific market needs.
With headquarters in Washington DC, Modus provides exemplary service for 400 law firms and 170 corporate clients from 14 US-based branches. Modus has been recognized by Inc. 500 as one of the fastest growing companies in the United States over the past two years.
Based upon a core foundation of “listening”, Modus’ advanced suite of eDiscovery, consulting and managed services provide law firms and corporations with advanced business-focused solutions by leveraging critical “discovery intelligence” (i.e. business intelligence”) obtained from multiple constituents to help organizations make better-informed decisions on individual legal matters and enterprise-wide legal operations.
